comment.author: Jonelle
comment.text: How can anyone watch this video and then watch anything put out by trump and think there is any comparison. Hillary is uplifting and positive and trump is all hate. God help us if he wins. I just hope the Democrats learned from the GOP and will be just as obstructive and organized to ruin a trump presidency. I pray that won't be needed.

replies.author: Kasie
replies.text: Because she is lying to her blind sheep... Wake up America!

replies.author: Bailey
replies.text: Hillary...Pedophile, child trafficker and satanic worshiper. Verified via WikiLeaks. You should all be ashamed!
